column1: Responses
You should definitely be buying and trying this toothpaste. It taste great, it doesn't burn your tongue, and makes your teeth pearly white! What are you waiting for buy it now!!
Works pretty good wasn't a fan of the flavor.
Worked great. Cleaned my teeth much better. Clean and fresh
wonderfully tasting wonderfully working cleaning , whitening works great
Whitening, thick, cleans teeth.
White teeth and a beautiful smile, this tooth paste is for you Without much effort, you'll refresh your smile 5 stars , indeed
What I liked about the toothpaste was the feeling on my teeth after. They felt really clean and my breath was fresh. Also after using it I could tell a huge difference in the whiteness of my teeth.
Well this toothpaste that I tested and to give my feedback on has been very refreshing it leaves your mouth very fresh makes you feel very clean something that a lot of toothpaste is can't relate to
Was a strong flavored and fresh smelling paste that seemed to be fast acting and made me feel like my teeth were fresh and somewhat whiter after each use.
Very refreshing Toothpaste. Made my teeth feel fresh and clean
Very refreshing and clean taste. Leaves my teeth smoother and shiny. I like the texture, it feels like it's really cleaning
Very good taste, good whitning and cleaning

Very good product. If I am being honest about this toothpaste I would have to say if leaves you with that after dentist feel. I love how it works from leaving my mouth feeling fresh to the whitening affect. This product gets the job done
Very good flavor, really like this mint flavor. It leaves your breath feeling very fresh.
Very good ,teeth are clean white breath stays freash
Toothpaste makes your teeth shiny on day one, it will help whiten your teeth progressively.
Toothpaste left teeth feeling clean and looking brighter! As a whitener, it wasn't as effective as I expected. My teeth do look at least a shade or so whiter. Good product overall!
Toothpaste is great. After a few days you will see results. My teeth have never been whiter!

Toothpaste has a refreshing feel with a good texture. I strongly dislike when the texture is gritty, but this kind has a nice, smooth consistency. I like that the color is pure white and does not have any color dyes in it.
Toothpaste came in a plain white no design so kinda bleh didn't know how to feel about it but over all it worked great teeth fee fresh and cleaner
Tooth paste was very refreshing . Made my teeth feel clean.
Tooth paste was great, is very minty almost too much where it numbs your mouth but leave fresh breath and clean teeth!
This whitening toothpaste is effective. It probably won't match specialized whitening treatments but in terms of value for money it beats a lot of them. It's gentle, refreshing and it realty works
This whitening fluoride toothpaste leaves my teeth feeling clean and fresh without sensitivity. The whitening is subtle but noticeable, and the flavor is nice. Definitely a solid choice!
This toothpaste works great to brighten your teeth, making them whiter and shiny. Nice long lasting flavor that keeps your breath fresh. I highly recommend you try it.
This toothpaste will not disappoint with its effective ingredients which keep your teeth feeling smooth and white.
This toothpaste whitens my teeth a little after 2 weeks of use. It's not too strong, so it doesn't cause any tooth sensitivity. Overall, it's a pretty good toothpaste.
This toothpaste whitens and brightens your teeth while leaving a clean, smooth feel
This toothpaste whiten my teeth at least a shade or two. It leaves your teeth feeling smooth after every use. The taste is great. Also I would definitely recommend this to my family and friends.

This toothpaste was very refreshing and it left a minty taste in your mouth for sometime. It made your teeth smooth, and I found personally that I didn't have as much tar as I usually do. Also, it did whiten my teeth up just to touch.

This toothpaste was very much to my liking. It had a nice minty taste that was not overpowering. It left my teeth feeling smooth and clean. It also left a nice shine after brushing. I would definitely buy and recommend it to others.

This toothpaste was just like all the name brand tooth pastes. It left me feeling clean and with good breath but it was not anything special. Did not see much whiting and did not help with sensitivity.
This toothpaste was excellent, it helped me feel and look more confident and comfortable when talking to people and smiling. It seemed to brighten up my teeth a bit more
This toothpaste was better than expected, it made my teeth look brighter and my mouth feeling fresh. I recommend it to everyone. A must try.

This toothpaste that I have been using for the last 2 weeks has been fantastic. My teeth are shiny more so now than before, and I felt so comfortable getting close with other people. My teeth have felt so clean and my mouth super clean. I've really enjoyed using this product of toothpaste thank you.
This toothpaste tastes great it, freshenings the breath and leaves you with a whiter smile.
This toothpaste refresh my breath and my teeth are more whiter.
This toothpaste really brought out my smile. I have used whitening toothpastes before but this one made my teeth look whiter and shiner!
This toothpaste provides the elements you want, fresh taste, whitening, clean feeling in an easy to squeeze tube.
This toothpaste not only brightens and whitens your teeth, but it has a good flavor. Highly recommend as it doesn't hurt your teeth.
This toothpaste makes your teeth visibly shinier with just one use! Multiple uses make teeth visibly whiter, and teeth feel extremely smooth and clean after every single use.
This toothpaste makes your teeth feel super clean and shiny.
This toothpaste makes my teeth squeaky clean and polished feeling. It isn't too harsh and leaves my breath minty all day long. I love how it feels and the taste is good as well.
this toothpaste makes my mouth feel so clean all day and my smile so white!
This toothpaste makes my mouth feel clean and makes my teeth shiny and look white.

This toothpaste made my teeth, feel clean and also whiten them, which is very hard to do with other toothpaste because I enjoy coffee, red wine, and that has stained my teeth over the years. I am very happy with this toothpaste.
This toothpaste made my teeth feel cleaner and brighter
This toothpaste made my mouth feel so much cleaner and healthier! I loved that my teeth were cleaner for a longer period of time. Using this toothpaste made a big difference for me
This toothpaste made my mouth and teeth feel nice and fresh. I like how my teeth was nice and clean and refreshing.

This toothpaste left my teeth feeling more clean than ever before. I was able to run my tongue over my teeth and feel nothing but smooth surface. My teeth are now even brighter and shinier after using this toothpaste, and I'd highly recommend it to everyone!
This toothpaste left my teeth feeling and looking so clean and my breath smelling fresh. My teeth felt smooth and looked more white than they were before. The tastes isn't too strong either.
This toothpaste left my mouth feeling refreshed. After just a few days, I noticed my teeth getting whiter and brighter. Highly recommend.

This toothpaste left my mouth feeling clean for multiple hours after brushing. The refreshing mint was an added plus that felt like it kept my mouth smelling fresh for longer than my normal toothpaste.
This toothpaste leaves your mouth feeling fresh and teeth feeling clean.
This toothpaste leaves my mouth feeling clean and my teeth shiny unlike some of the other toothpaste I have used
This toothpaste lasts a long time. It makes myouth feel clean and fresh. Foams nicely, just the right flavor and my teeth feel smooth and clean.
This toothpaste is very refreshing and effective. Left my teeth feeling smooth and clean

This toothpaste is very minty and leaves your teeth feeling clean. It freshens your breath and makes your teeth shiny, if used everyday it starts to move your teeth to a more white shade as you use it.

This toothpaste is truly amazing, have not used a toothpaste in a long time that leaves your month feeling refreshed and silky clean. This toothpaste does not taste bad and the fresh breath experience lasts throughout the day. Looking forward to knowing the name of the toothpaste so I can purchase it in the future.
This toothpaste is the best toothpaste I have ever used. It got my teeth whiter. It kept my whole mouth feeling cleaner. It helped my breath smell better
this toothpaste is rather good. i saw differences in my teeth within a matter of days. not only does it smell good but it left my teeth brighter.
This toothpaste is phenomenal. The quality of freshness mixed with the icy taste makes it a win win all the way around. 10 out of 10
This toothpaste is minty and effective . Leaves your teeth feeling clean and shiny
This toothpaste is just okay. I didn't notice my teeth becoming whiter. It does have a fresh, minty taste though.
This toothpaste is incredibly good I would purchase this
This toothpaste is great. It's whitening my teeth and makes my mouth feel fresh for hours. The toothpaste foams up really good and a little goes a long way.
This toothpaste is great. It leaves your teeth very clean, and it has a fresh feeling at last for a couple of hours
This toothpaste is great. I love how it makes your teeth feel bright and clean.

This toothpaste is great! It leaves my mouth and teeth feeling fresh and clean. It successfully rids me of morning breath and gives me confidence for the rest of the day. My teeth are left shiny and plaque-free after using this toothpaste

This toothpaste is great! It definitely seems like it is helping to whiten my teeth. They look much whiter to me and some of the old staining doesn't seem as drastic. It leaves your breath smelling minty fresh.
This toothpaste is great quality, it makes my mouth fresh and my teeth squeaky clean.
This toothpaste is great my teeth are much brighter than prior use and my mouth constantly feels clean throughout the day!
This toothpaste is great it really improved my teeth making it shiny and bright
This toothpaste is fabolous will leave your teeth feeling clean and fresh. Your breath will smell amazing.
This toothpaste is effective, covers my teeth well and leaves my teeth and breath feeling fresh all day

This toothpaste is basic, don't spend more than $5 on this tube. It leaves a decent taste in your mouth for a SHORT time, cleans the teeth, but does not whiten. Nu mid-morning, you're wishing you had your toothbrush with you.

This toothpaste is awesome! I've used it for two weeks and have noticed results almost instantly. My teeth are 2-3 times whiter and they shine so nice like they were polished. It also makes my mouth feel clean and breath feel fresh. I give this toothpaste five star.
This toothpaste is as reliable as I thought it would be. It tastes on par with how toothpaste shotsste, and the packaging is appealing. I found my teeth were glossy and clean every time.
This toothpaste is amazing! My teeth are noticeably whiter and brighter. After brushing, my teeth also feel smooth and clean. My fresh breath lasts longer too! Great product. Definitely recommend!
This toothpaste is amazing and has a great flavor
This toothpaste is A Game Changer, not only does it taste great, it actually has made my mouth feel fresher and my teeth are visibly whiter! This is a MUST!
This toothpaste I used is perfect .My teeth look a lot better ,they are bright and shiny.They look pretty.
This toothpaste has just the right amount of foaming action and leaves your entire mouth feeling clean.
This toothpaste has an amazing feel. It makes your teeth feel extremely clean and smooth after using it, and my teeth are brighter than they have been in a while.
This toothpaste has a very clean, refreshing feel and taste …..taste lasts after using for awhile too. My teeth feel and look shiny and seem whiter!!No negative's to say
This toothpaste has a pleasant taste and aroma, and seems to effectively clean my teeth. My mouth stays fresh for a decent period of time.

This toothpaste has a great taste, very easy to use and easy to see the results. My teeth felt shinier, I would say my teeth are pretty white and so I didn't see too much improvement in that area but my breath smelled a TON better than any of the other toothpastes I'd been using. This definitely would be my new go to!
This Toothpaste has a good taste. It cleans my teeth and makes them feel like they were cleaned by a dentist. It helps to whiten your teeth as you use it each time.
This toothpaste has a good minty flavor leaves my teeth feeling clean and my mouth refreshed as well I can tell that my teeth are not only wider but they are brighter since using this toothpaste

This toothpaste has a fresh clean taste and keeps my teeth clean all day. My teeth feel so smooth when I brush. And over the last 2 weeks my teeth have gotten brighter. I would recommend this to anyone who wants a better smile!

This toothpaste had my mouth feeling bright, clean, and fresh! Started whitening my teeth after the first couple uses! Made my teeth feel a bit sensitive but I've had that reaction with most whitening toothpastes. Would definitely keep using this.
This toothpaste gives you a nice white shiny appearance to your teeth
This toothpaste gives me the freshest breath and lingering freshness. My teeth feel smooth and are shiny. I've noticed an improvement in stains.
This toothpaste freshener your breath longer than others. It whitens really well and made my teeth feel better. It is definately a good investment of your money.
This toothpaste cleans my teeth. My teeth are whiter than ever. It has a great taste

This toothpaste cleans effectively, leaving your mouth feeling fresh without irritation. It creates a pleasant amount of foam and ensures a refreshing breath that lasts. The formula is gentle yet powerful, making it an ideal choice for daily use. Highly recommended for a comfortable and clean experience.
This toothpaste brand is refreshing for my mouth and has a terrific taste. After I'm done brushing my teeth I get a cool fresh feeling
This tooth paste was amazing. It made my teeth feel so clean and feel so shiny I would love to buy this product
This tooth paste was amazing the best I have ever used. It keeps your mouth staying fresh and clean making teeth whiter and looking great.
This tooth paste is amazing . I realized whitening after first use . I wish I knew the name brand so I could buy more for future uses
